page.title: 06The Council
page.content: Today,June 27th. 1985,We visited our {local council}offices.They are not very far from our school and were originally a convent.{The Presentation {Convent.}Although the council tender for the sale was not the highest,the nuns wished the building to remain as it is,so the council bought it.It was the previous home of the{Lord of the {Manor. The present Mayor is Mr.Evans,who has been in office five weeks.His term expires in May 1986.Our village also has{His Right Worshipful the Mayor of {Wakefield,}so we have a double honour. The Mayor is leader of a fifteen strong council and they deal with all aspects of our local area_housing cleaning,parks,recreation etc.The Mayor has 3 main aims;to help the unemployed,start the Community centre and tackle vandalisum.
